entities.description: The frequency at which respondents needed more heroin to get the feeling they wanted.
Reduction in the effect of heroin when using the same amount.
Attempts by respondents to cut down or stop using heroin in the past 12 months.
Frequency at which respondents were unable to cut down or stop using heroin more than once in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the frequency at which more heroin was needed to get the desired effect.
Relates the survey to the reduction in the effect of heroin using the same amount.
Relates the survey to attempts to cut down or stop using heroin in the past 12 months.
Relates the survey to the frequency at which respondents failed to cut down or stop using heroin more than once in the past 12 months.
